Instructions.1: Missing fields will generate warnings and a default value will be added to the configuration.
Instructions.2: SomeDebug value is set as a macro to help debug build system, macro conversion of different data types, etc.
Instructions.3: Enabling Interarrival Mode will disable all other functionality.
Instructions.4: Options specific to a Feature Line are ignored unless that Feature Line is selected.
Instructions.5: The address for the emulator's virtual Port is `/dev/corr_virtual_serial_port` (only for linux).
